rationale: Mochokiella paynei is only known from the type locality, Kassawe Forest Reserve, Sierra Leone. The EOO is over 100 km² and AOO is less than 10 km². However the species is protected in the reserve and there is no threats to the species. It is therefore assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Entsua-Mensah, M., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.
